text: Sphingomonas gei is a Gram-negative, strictly aerobic and motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas with a single polar flagellum which has been isolated from roots of the plant Geum aleppicum from the Mount Taibai in the Shaanxi Province in China. == Further reading == * == References == gei Category:Bacteria described in 2015 Category:Gram-negative bacteria
title: Sphingomonas gei
